name: Hand Eye Cubination
description: Are you after a new VR experience?Come try Hand Eye Cubination!Your job is to guide two cubes through a series of challenging levels with nothing more than your perception of where your flailing limbs are pointing!With no visual clues to assist, you will rely 100% on your human senses to get you through!Check out the store for more info!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater. Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
